00027                                                                                                                                  {
00028         p = new double[bins+1][bins+1]; // last bin is for missing data
00029         int N = 0;
00030         for (int m=-hx; m <= hx; ++m){
00031             for (int n=-hy; n <= hy; ++n){
00032                 int value1 = input.getMissing();
00033                 if ( input.isValid(x+m,y+n) ){
00034                     value1 = input.getValue(x+m,y+n);
00035                 }
00036                 int value2 = input.getMissing();
00037                 if ( input.isValid(x+m+dir.xadd,y+n+dir.yadd) ){
00038                     value2 = input.getValue(x+m+dir.xadd,y+n+dir.yadd);
00039                 }
00040                 int bin1 = findBin(value1,input.getMissing(),min,incr,bins);
00041                 int bin2 = findBin(value2,input.getMissing(),min,incr,bins);
00042                 p[bin1][bin2]++;
00043                 ++N;
00044             }
00045         }
00046         for (int i=0; i < p.length; ++i) for (int j=0; j < p.length; ++j){
00047             p[i][j] /= N;
00048         }
00049     }

double edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.GraylevelCooccurenceMatrix.computeDifferenceMoment ( int  order  )  

00096                                                     {
00097         double result = 0;
00098         int N = p.length;
00099         for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) for (int j=0; j < N; ++j){
00100             if (i != j){
00101                 result += p[i][j]*p[i][j]/Math.pow(Math.abs(i-j),order);
00102             }
00103         }
00104         return result;
00105     }

double edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.GraylevelCooccurenceMatrix.computeEntropy (  )  

00076                                   {
00077         double result = 0;
00078         int N = p.length;
00079         for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) for (int j=0; j < N; ++j){
00080             if (p[i][j] > 0){
00081                 result += p[i][j]*Math.log(p[i][j])/Math.log(2);
00082             }
00083         }
00084         return result;
00085     }

double edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.GraylevelCooccurenceMatrix.computeMaximumProbability (  )  

00087                                              {
00088         double result = 0;
00089         int N = p.length;
00090         for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) for (int j=0; j < N; ++j){
00091             result = Math.max(result, p[i][j]);
00092         }
00093         return result;
00094     }

int  missing,

) [package] 

00050                                                                   {
00051         if (val != missing && val >= min) {
00052             int bin_no = (val - min) / incr;
00053             // last bin is unbounded
00054             if (bin_no >= bins)
00055                 bin_no = bins - 1;
00056             return bin_no;
00057         }
00058         return bins; // for missing data
00059     }
